name: npc-finder
description: Your personal dashboard for entertainment, music, games, tasks, and memories. Track, organize, and curate your life with flexible board-based task management.
author: Afton Gauntlett

scripts.security:check: npm audit --audit-level=moderate && npm run lint && npm run test -- --run
scripts.db:migration:list:dev: dotenv -e .env.local -- bash -c 'npx supabase link --project-ref "$VITE_SUPABASE_DEV_PROJECT_REF" && npx supabase migration list'
scripts.db:migration:list:prod: dotenv -e .env.local -- bash -c 'npx supabase link --project-ref "$VITE_SUPABASE_PROD_PROJECT_REF" && npx supabase migration list'
scripts.db:push:dev: dotenv -e .env.local -- bash -c 'npx supabase link --project-ref "$VITE_SUPABASE_DEV_PROJECT_REF" && npx supabase db push --linked'
scripts.db:push:prod:
echo '
⚠️⚠️⚠️  DANGER: PUSHING TO PRODUCTION DATABASE  ⚠️⚠️⚠️
' && echo 'This will modify the live production database with real user data.' && echo 'Have you tested this migration in dev first?' && echo '
Press Ctrl+C NOW to cancel...
' && sleep 7 && dotenv -e .env.local -- bash -c 'npx supabase link --project-ref "$VITE_SUPABASE_PROD_PROJECT_REF" && npx supabase db push'
scripts.db:reset:dev: dotenv -e .env.local -- bash -c 'npx supabase link --project-ref "$VITE_SUPABASE_DEV_PROJECT_REF" && npx supabase db reset'
scripts.db:diff:dev: dotenv -e .env.local -- bash -c 'npx supabase link --project-ref "$VITE_SUPABASE_DEV_PROJECT_REF" && npx supabase db diff'
